results.title: Overview of the prospective randomized evaluation of the vascular effects of Norvasc (amlodipine) trial: PREVENT.
results.text_hl: Moreover, significant cardiac events, particularly admissions to hospital for @<m>DISEASE_Angina_Unstable</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000789 @@@unstable angina@@@ and intervention, were significantly reduced in the @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@-treated @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@.

results.title: Effect of amlodipine on the progression of atherosclerosis and the occurrence of clinical events. PREVENT Investigators.
results.text_hl: There was no treatment difference in the rates of all-cause mortality or major cardiovascular events, although @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ use was associated with fewer cases of @<m>DISEASE_Angina_Unstable</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000789 @@@unstable angina@@@ and coronary revascularization.

citations.NLM: Pitt B, Byington RP, Furberg CD, Hunninghake DB, Mancini GB, Miller ME, Riley W. Effect of amlodipine on the progression of atherosclerosis and the occurrence of clinical events. PREVENT Investigators. Circulation. 2000 Sep 26;102(13):1503-10. PMID: 11004140

results.title: Mechanisms of atherosclerotic plaque stabilization for a lipophilic calcium antagonist amlodipine.
results.text_hl: The results of PREVENT showed that @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ receiving @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ had marked reductions in hospitalization for revascularization and @<m>DISEASE_Angina_Unstable</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000789 @@@unstable angina@@@ compared with placebo in a population consisting of either normotensive or controlled @DISEASE_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertensive@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@.

results.title: Treatment of hypertension in patients > or =65 years of age: experience with amlodipine.
results.text_hl: @SPECIES_9606 @@@Patients@@@ were assigned to 1 of 4 treatment schedules: @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ monotherapy or combination therapy and @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ given once daily in the morning or in the evening.

results.title: [Indication and advantage of combination therapy with angiotensin II receptor blocker (ARB) and calcium channel antagonist].
results.text_hl: Among the individual events in @DISEASE_Cardiovascular_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D002318 @@@MACE@@@, the incidence of @<m>DISEASE_Angina_Unstable</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000789 @@@unstable angina pectoris@@@ requiring hospitalization was significantly lower by 52% (p = 0.007).
